tool_description: The Affordable SMS API, send 100 SMS for only $1. Receive 100 free credits on signup.
name: SMSjet
title: SMSjet

api_list.name: Send 2FA Token
api_list.description: Easily send 2FA tokens to your users for sign in purposes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smsjet.p.rapidapi.com/api/2fa/sms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smsjet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send SMS
api_list.description:
Phone numbers must include the country code prefix, e.g. '+61412345678', or '+61 4123 45678'.
The leading '+' can be omitted, but it will be added automatically.
You can test your phone number validity with the /api/validate/ endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://smsjet.p.rapidapi.com/api/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "smsjet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
